div.p: Ridgefield Board of Education has rescheduled their Business Meeting from April 23, 2020 to Thursday, April 30, 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Board of Education Meeting

img.alt: Click here to visit the Ridgefield School District Extended Closure Student/Parent Portal

a.span: Click here to visit the Ridgefield School District Extended Closure Student/Parent Portal

div.p: Ridgefield School District Extended Closure Student/Parent Portal

a.title: Go to comments for Click here to visit the Ridgefield School District Extended Closure Student/Parent Portal

div.p: At the February 26th Board of Education meeting, Ms. Janet Seabold and Mr. Anthony DiBona introduced the new cooperative education program at RMHS. Within this program, students have the opportunity to earn high school credit while participating in the true workplace environment. This program provides students with valuable school to career skills and experiences. For more information, please click on the headline above.

a.title: Go to comments for RMHS Cooperative Education Program
